ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 122
ygData.msgSnippet: Its not about chatting !!! I don t need some lame ass chat room to talk to him.  I get bored to death with ICQ and chats and all that stupid crap!!  Its not
ygData.messageBody:
Its not about "chatting"!!! I don't need some lame ass chat room to
talk to him. I get bored to death with ICQ and chats and all that
stupid crap!! Its not even about talking...its about doing something
together....the working together. We don't have anything to do
together besides talking about "well so have you talked to dad lately?
or how's mom doing?" BORING!!! BUT when we are in EQ we fight mobs
together and I trust him completely..he is my brother! I love him more
than anyone. We just don't have much to say and this way its like he
lives near me and I can do things with him all the time. Last time I
saw him...we sat and played diablo all day or something. This is
something we enjoy doing together! And for your info..yes I have been
in Lower guk fighting and carrying on a coversation with him....guess I
am just multi-tasking...or something.

--- Robert Hillyer <robhillyer@...> wrote:
> If the only reason you and your brother talk to each other is because
> you
> are both in EQ than you have a serious relationship problem. You
> could chat
> in e-mail or ICQ but you say you dont have the time. For your own
> brother?
> Yet you go ingame and use it like a chat room, doing nothing but
> sending
> messages back and forth. You can't tell me you are in Sol B fighting
> whatever while you chat with him. I've tried carrying on
> conversations while
> fighting and it doesn't work real well. So you sit in game and chat
> but you
> have no time to sit out of game and chat. With your own family.....
> That
> doesnt make EQ more than a game, just a game with a chat
> feature......
>
